doc.title: GS Flow of Funds: Back to School 高盛资金流动：重返校园
doc.source_uri: 25.9月 普通个人版/9.1 普通个人版/GS/GS Flow of Funds_ Back to School 高盛资金流动：重返校园_2025-09-01

passages.text: Back to School season means back to school to work which is especially salient as we jump into September - Here' s the technical checklist for this month:
返校季意味着重返校园和工作，这在我们进入九月时尤为显著——以下是本月的技术清单：

1. Positioning - Institutional, retail, foreign  
1. 仓位——机构、零售、海外  
2. Seasonality 2. 季节性  
3. Fund flows 3. 资金流向  
4. CTAs + Vol Control  
4. CTA + 波动率控制  
5. Funding Spreads 5. 融资利差  
6. Gamma 6. Gamma (伽马值)  
7. Correlation 7. 相关性  
8. All things vol  
8. 一切关于波动性
The seasonally worst month of the year is upon us - with 2H September bringing the worst two-week period of the year. Systematic demand has dried up, removing a key piece of

support from the market. Institutions have net sold US equities for two months straight, and are angled cautious for September, but positioning remains modest relative to history which we expect will keep dips shallow barring fundamental shocks. Low correlation and dealers long gamma will keep moves on the index level muted for now. We expect this month to be challenging and driven by active stock- picking on the institutional level while retail continues to direct flows into passive funds.

一年中季节性最差的月份已经到来——9月下半月将迎来全年最糟糕的两周。系统性需求已经枯竭，市场失去了一项关键支撑。机构投资者已连续两个月净卖出美国股票，并在9月保持谨慎态度，但相较历史水平，仓位仍然温和，我们预计除非出现基本面冲击，否则回调将较为浅显。低相关性以及交易而持有的多头gamma头寸将使指数层面的波动暂时保持平缓。我们预计本月将充满挑战，并由机构层面的主动选股驱动，而散户则会继续将资金流向被动型基金。
We like QQQ 1m 98- 88% put spreads to protect length in the market (10x1 payout)" \*costs 98bps\* as of Friday's close (ref 570.40)
我们看好QQQ一个月期98- 88%看跌价差，以保护市场多头头寸（10倍赔付），截至周五收盘（参考价570.40）成本为98个基点。
1. institutional positioning 机构持仓
"Why is the GS Sentiment Indicator still yielding a negative reading with the recent rally?" Great question
"为什么在近期反弹的情况下，GS 情绪指标仍然是负值？”这是个好问题
When taking historical flows into consideration, positioning is still relatively balanced, and nearly all cohorts accounted for in our model have room to add length
在考虑历史资金流动的情况下，仓位仍相对均衡，我们模型中几乎所有的投资群体都有加仓的空间
We believe current positioning will keep dips shallow barring any fundamental shocks
我们认为当前的仓位状况将使回调幅度保持有限，除非出现任何基本面的冲击
Source: Goldman Sachs Global Investment Research, Kartik Jayachandran, as of 8/28/25. Past performance is not indicative of future returns来源：高盛全球投资研究，Kartik Jayachandran，截至2025年8月28日。过往表现不代表未来回报。
For the full PB book (incl. all HF types), Gross and Net leverage are both near their respective 1-year averages (89th and 59th percentiles 5-year, respectively). While Fundamental L/S Net
leverage has risen sharply in the past few months, it is \~flat so far in August and still below its YTD high seen in February
对于整个 PB 账簿（包括所有对冲基金类型），总杠杆率和净杠杆率均接近各自的 1 年平均水平（分别处于过去 5 年的第 89 和第 59 百分位）。尽管基本面多空策略的净杠杆率在过去几个月大幅上升，但截至目前 8 月份基本持平，且仍低于 2 月份出现的年内高点。

US Fundamental L/S Gross and Net leverage are +3.6 pts and - 0.5 pts MTD, respectively, suggesting increased risk appetite but a modest decline in directional bias. US L/S Gross leverage is still elevated in the 97th percentile on a 5- year lookback while Net leverage is below average in the 32nd percentile
美国基本面多空总杠杆和净杠杆在本月至今分别上升了 3.6 个百分点和下降了 0.5 个百分点，表明风险偏好有所提升，但方向性偏好略有下降。美国多空总杠杆在过去 5 年的区间中仍处于第 97 百分位的高位，而净杠杆则低于平均水平，处于第 32 百分位。

Source: Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities and Prime Services data as of August 26, 2025. Past performance is not indicative of future results. All references to "we/us/our" refer to the views and observations of the desk unless specified otherwise.
来源：高盛FICC和股票及主经纪商服务数据，截至2025年8月26日。过往表现不代表未来结果。除非另有说明，所有提及“我们/我方/本方”均指该交易台的观点和观察。

Despite continued market rally, HFs are on track to sell US equities for a second consecutive month, driven by short sales outpacing long buys across both Macro Products and Single Stocks, which points to a more cautious stance going into September
尽管市场持续反弹，对冲基金正朝着连续第二个月抛售美国股票的方向发展，这主要是由于在宏观产品和单一股票中，卖空规模超过了买入规模，这表明在进入九月份时采取了更为谨慎的立场
Prime Book: Monthly Trading Flow - US Equities

Source: Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities and Prime Services data as of August 26, 2025. Past performance is not indicative of future results. All references to "we/us/our" refer to the views and observations of the desk unless specified otherwise.
来源：高盛FICC、股票及主经纪商服务数据，截至2025年8月26日。过往业绩并不代表未来结果。除非另有说明，所有“我们/我方”的表述均指交易台的观点和观察。

We' d be remiss not to highlight that HFs have aggressively rotated into EM stocks (led by Chinese equities) this past month. This month' s notional net buying flows across broader EM and China on the Prime book are both on track to be the largest on our record (+3 sigma move vs. the last 10 years), driven by long buying
我们必须指出，对冲基金在过去一个月大举转向新兴市场股票（以中国股票为主）。本月在主经纪业务账簿中，涵盖更广泛新兴市场和中国的名义净买入流量均有望创下我们有记录以来的最高水平（相较过去10年为+3个标准差的变动），主要由做多买入推动。
We' ve seen bullish China flows across the desk primarily concentrated in China tech ETFs and megacap names like BABA - RoW is back in focus, and we will continue to track this flow
我们在交易台观察到的看涨中国资金流主要集中在中国科技类ETF和BABA等超大市值股票——其他地区重新受到关注，我们将继续跟踪这一资金流向。
Prime Book: EM Equities

Source: Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities and Prime Services data as of August 26, 2025. Past performance is not indicative of future results. All references to "we/us/our" refer to the views and observations of the desk unless specified otherwise.
来源：高盛FICC与股票及主经纪商服务数据，截至2025年8月26日。过往表现不代表未来结果。所有提及“我们”的内容，除非另有说明，均指本交易台的观点与观察。
For those involved in markets, the end of summer and start of fall brings about the September Scarries - seasonality对于参与市场的人来说，夏末秋初会带来“九月恐惧”——季节性规律
September is comfortably in first place as the worst month of the year for the S&P 500 with an average return of - 1.17% looking back to 1928
Flow of Funds - Average SPX Returns by Month (1928 -)

Source: Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities, Gail Haff as of 8/30/25. Past performance is not indicative of future returns. Simulated results are for illustrative purposes only. GS provides no assurance or guarantee that the strategy will operate or would have operated in the past in a manner consistent with the above analysis. Past performance figures are not a reliable indicator of future results.
来源：Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities, Gail Haff, 截至2025年8月30日。过往表现不代表未来回报。“模拟结果仅供说明之用。高盛不对该策略未来的运作方式或其过去是否会上述分析一致提供任何保证或担保。过往业绩数据并非未来结果的可靠指标。”
2H September is the worst two-week period of the year with an average return of - 1.38% looking back from 1928  9 月下半月是全年最差的两周时期，自 1928 年以来平均回报率为- 1.38%
However, the first half of September is more moderate with smaller chops which is a trend we believe will dictate this month's early trading due in large part to current positioning
然而，9 月上半月相对温和，波动较小，我们认为这一趋势将在很大程度上由于当前的仓位状况而主导本月早期的交易

Source: Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities, Gail Haff as of 8/30/25. Past performance is not indicative of future returns. "Simulated results are for illustrative purposes only. GS provides no assurance or guarantee that the strategy will operate or would have operated in the past in a manner consistent with the above analysis. Past performance figures are not a reliable indicator of future results.
来源：高盛FICC和股票部，GailHaff，截至2025年8月30日。过往业绩并不代表未来回报。“模拟结果仅用于说明目的。高盛不保证该策略将来会或过去曾以上述分析一致的方式运作。过往业绩数据并不能可靠地预测未来结果。
Going, going...gone. CTA positioning in US equities officially sits in the 100th percentile and is maxed out成交，成交......清仓。CTA在美国股票的持仓正式处于第100百分位，已达到最大水平
While not an active headwind to equities, this means less supportive flows in a historically weak month虽然这对股票并非直接的逆风因素，但在一个历史上较弱的月份，这意味着支撑性资金流会减少

Our GS model estimates that CTAs bought \(12.56bn worth of US equities in August - down\) 15.1bn from the month of July (CTAs bought \(27.66bn\)). We predict even less for the month of September where CTAs are modelled to buy\) 2.96bn of US equities over the next month
我们的高盛模型估计，CTA在8月份买入了价值125.6亿美元的美国股票——较7月份的276.6亿美元减少了151亿美元。我们预测9月份的规模会更小，模型显示CTA在接下来一个月将买入价值29.6亿美元的美国股票
Over the next 1 week...

Flat tape: Global Buyers \(1.67B\) (\$1.33B into the US)  横盘行情：全球买入16.7亿美元（其中13.3亿美元流入美国）  Up tape: Global Buyers \(0.60B\) (\$0.73B into the US)  上涨行情：全球买入6亿美元（其中7.3亿美元流入美国）  Down tape: Global Sellers \(22.25B\) (\$4.84B out of the US)  下跌行情：全球卖出222.5亿美元（其中48.4亿美元流出美国）
Over the next 1 month...

Flat tape: Global Sellers \(1.79B\) (\$2.96B into the US)  横盘行情：全球卖方179亿美元（其中29.6亿美元流入美国）  Up tape: Global Buyers \(11.13B\) (\$3.55B into the US)  上涨行情：全球买方1113亿美元（其中35.5亿美元流入美国）  Down tape: Global Sellers \(217.92B\) (\$73.69B out of the US)  下跌行情：全球卖方2179.2亿美元（其中736.9亿美元流出美国）
CTA Positioning in US Equities

Source: Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities Futures Sales Strats as of 8/29/25. Past performance is not indicative of future returns. "Simulated results are for illustrative purposes only. GS provides no assurance or guarantee that the strategy will operate or would have operated in the past in a manner consistent with the above analysis. Past performance figures are not a reliable indicator of future results.
来源：高盛FICC和股票期货销售策略团队，截至2025年8月29日。过往业绩并不代表未来回报。“模拟结果仅供说明之用。高盛不保证该策略将来会或过去曾以与上述分析一致的方式运作。过往业绩数据并不能可靠地预测未来结果。
While the cohort is modelled to buy small over the next month, the risk exists asymmetrically to the downside with \$73.69B worth of US equities to sell in a down tape
尽管模型预测该群体在下个月将小幅买入，但风险却呈现不对称的下行倾向，在市场下跌时可能会抛售价值736.9亿美元的美国股票。
市场洞察 - Marquees - Market Insights - Marquees

Source: Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities Futures Sales Strats as of 8/29/25. Past performance is not indicative of future returns. "Simulated results are for illustrative purposes only. GS provides no assurance or guarantee that the strategy will operate or would have operated in the past in a manner consistent with the above analysis. Past performance figures are not a reliable indicator of future results.
来源：高盛FICC和股票期货销售策略团队，截至2025年8月29日。过往业绩并不代表未来回报。“模拟结果仅用于说明目的。高盛不保证该策略将来会或过去曾以上述分析一致的方式运作。过往业绩数据并不能可靠地预测未来结果。
With implied and realized levels near 1yr lows, Vol Control funds have added considerate length
由于隐含波动率和实际波动率接近一年低点，波动率控制基金已大幅加仓
On April 15th, positioning stood at \(74.01B\) in US equities versus \(\) 170.91B\(as of August 30th\) 截至4月15日，在美国股票的持仓为740.1亿美元，而截至8月30日，则为1709.1亿美元
Vol Control Positioning

Source: Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities Futures Sales Strats as of 8/29/25. Past performance is not indicative of future returns. "Simulated results are for illustrative purposes only. GS provides no assurance or guarantee that the strategy will operate or would have operated in the past in a manner consistent with the above analysis. Past performance figures are not a reliable indicator of future results.
来源：高盛FICC和股票期货销售策略团队，截至2025年8月29日。过往业绩并不代表未来回报。“模拟结果仅用于说明目的。高盛不保证该策略将来会或过去曾以与上述分析一致的方式运作。过往业绩数据并不能可靠地预测未来结果。
S&P funding rose from 56.28bps as of May \(1^{st}\) to 77.99 bps (38.57% increase)
标普融资利差从5月1日的56.28个基点 \(^{st}\) 上升至77.99个基点（上涨38.57%）
The recent rally has driven up leverage among institutional and systematic investors – we will keep an eye on funding spreads 近期的反弹推动了机构和系统性投资者的杠杆水平上升——我们将持续关注融资利差

Source: Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities Futures Sales Strats as of 8/29/25. Past performance is not indicative of future returns. "Simulated results are for illustrative purposes only. GS provides no assurance or guarantee that the strategy will operate or would have operated in the past in a manner consistent with the above analysis. Past performance figures are not a reliable indicator of future results.
来源：高盛FICC和股票期货销售策略团队，截至2025年8月29日。过往表现并不代表未来回报。“模拟结果仅供说明之用。高盛不对该策略将来或过去的运作方式与上述分析一致提供任何保证或担保。过往业绩数据并非未来结果的可靠指标。
While retail has been increasingly active in driving single names, they are still primarily loyal to passive funds尽管散户在推动个股交易方面日益活跃，但他们仍主要忠于被动型基金

Retail passive investing is driving the further divergence between active and passive funds, and given ETF construction, these dollars are still heavily concentrated to Mag7散户的被动投资正在推动主动型基金与被动型基金之间的进一步分化，而鉴于ETF的构成，这些资金仍高度集中于“Mag7”
Source: Goldman Sachs Global Investment Research, Kartik Jayachandran, as of 8/28/25. Past performance is not indicative of future returns
来源：高盛全球投资研究，Kartik Jayachandran，截至2025年8月28日。过往表现不代表未来回报。
Ranking Asset Allocation flows in US funds since 2019: 自2019年以来美国基金资产配置资金流入排名：

1. \(4.09\) Trillion inflows into US money market funds  
1.4.09 万亿美元流入美国货币市场基金

2. \(2.46\) Trillion inflows into US bond funds  
2.2.46 万亿美元流入美国债券基金
3. \(247\) Billion inflows into US equity funds or 4.5x more inflows into MMF than stocks
3.2470 亿美元流入美国股票基金，即货币市场基金的流入量是股票的4.5倍
Yes, that is right – inflows into money market funds are now 16.5x that of equities – the S&P might be up, but CASH is still King
是的，没错——流入货币市场基金的资金现在是股票的16.5倍——标普指数或许在上涨，但现金依然为王
Source: Goldman Sachs Global Investment Research, Kartik Jayachandran, as of 8/28/25. Past performance is not indicative of future returns
来源：高盛全球投资研究，Kartik Jayachandran，截至2025年8月28日。过往表现不代表未来回报。
We estimate that dealers are long gamma which will keep the market rangebound at the index level - the 10d change in dealer gamma positioning is the largest increase in our history at \(10.9bn\)
我们估计交易商持有多头gamma，这将使指数层面的市场维持区间波动——交易商gamma持仓在过去10天的变化是我们历史上最大的一次增加，达到109亿美元
当前的 gamma 区间起到市场缓冲作用，并将支撑市场在抛售时企稳
SPX Dealer Gamma Positioning - 10d Change

Source: Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities Futures Sales Strats as of 8/29/25. Past performance is not indicative of future returns. "Simulated results are for illustrative purposes only. GS provides no assurance or guarantee that the strategy will operate or would have operated in the past in a manner consistent with the above analysis. Past performance figures are not a reliable indicator of future results.
来源：高盛FICC和股票期货销售策略，截至2025年8月29日。过往表现不代表未来回报。“模拟结果仅用于说明目的。高盛不对该策略将来或过去的运作方式与上述分析一致提供任何保证或担保。过往业绩数据并非未来结果的可靠指标。
Correlation over the summer has been hovering near 30- year lows at almost two standard deviations away from average
整个夏季的相关性一直徘徊在接近30年低点，几乎比平均水平低两个标准差
这一直是一个选股者的市场，我们认为这种情况在短期内将会持续
S&P 3-Month Realized Correlation

Source: Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities Futures Sales Strats as of 8/29/25. Past performance is not indicative of future returns. "Simulated results are for illustrative purposes only. GS provides no assurance or guarantee that the strategy will operate or would have operated in the past in a manner consistent with the above analysis. Past performance figures are not a reliable indicator of future results.
来源：截至2025年8月29日，高盛FICC和股票期货销售策略部。过往业绩并不代表未来回报。“模拟结果仅供说明之用。高盛不对该策略将来或过去的运作方式与上述分析一致提供任何保证或担保。过往业绩数据并非未来结果的可靠指标。
Just when you think it can't reset any lower, it does? 当你以为它已经不能再低时，它又降了？
S&P 1m IV levels are just off 1yr lows and screen as extremely cheap when taking into account all of September's scheduled calendar events (and the ones that aren't)
标普1个月隐含波动率水平刚刚脱离一年低点，考虑到整个9月的所有已安排日程事件（以及那些未安排的事件），其价格看起来极为便宜。
Nasdaq spreads to S&P have finally normalized making NDX spread expressions attractive again
纳斯达克与标普的利差终于恢复正常，使得NDX利差交易再次具有吸引力

As GS PB notes, net allocations in AI stocks (GSTMTAIP) and Mag7 have continued to tick higher and are hovering around one- year highs, and following the capital N clearing event, we think investors look for cheap hedges on their long megacap tech positions
正如GS PB所指出的，AI股票（GSTMTAIP）和“Mag7”的净配置持续上升，并徘徊在一年高位附近。在资本N清算事件之后，我们认为投资者正在为其大型科技股多头头寸寻找廉价的对冲工具

This message has been prepared by personnel in the Goldman Sachs FICC and Equities business units of one or more affiliates of The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. ("Goldman Sachs") and is not the product of Global Investment Research. It is not a research report and is not intended as such.
